The post included a photo of Sri Lankan: as well as a link to a YouTube video titled “Gazette Notification forbidding burqa issued”.
The Sinhala: language caption of the post translated to English as: “Burqa banned!! / Gazette notification issued.”
The claim was debunked by various source: including a keyword search for the title of the YouTube video mentioned in the misleading Facebook post, which found a video published on the channel for Sri Lankan television channel Ada Derana on May 15, 2019.
